text: isapar usakee qaum ke saradaar, jinhonne inakaar kiya tha, kahane lage, "hamaaree drshti mein to tum hamaare hee jaise aadamee ho aur ham dekhate hai ki bas kuchh aise log hee tumhaare anuyaayee hai jo pahalee spasht mein hamaare yahaan ke neech hai. ham apane muqaabale mein tumamen koee badaee nahin dekhate, balki ham to tumhen jhootha samajhate hai.
